Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Awards high school diplomas to veterans; repealer
Summary: Allows any veteran who has served this nation to be awarded a high school degree based on their knowledge and experience gained while in service.
LawCode: Rpld ยง305 subs 29-a & 29-b, amd ยง305, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to awarding high school diplomas to veterans; and repealing certain provisions of such law relating thereto
